content.text:
# 6th WBFJA Awards

| presented_date   =
| date                = 8 January 2023
| site                =
| organiser           = West Bengal Film Journalists’ Association (WBFJA)
|best_film=DostojeeAparajito
|best_direction=Anik Dutta
|best_actor=Dev Ritwick Chakraborty
|best_actress=Gargi Roychowdhury
|last=5th|next=7th|year=2022-2023
| website          =
}}
6th Edition of The WBFJA Award, also known as Cinemar Samabartan (Convocation of Cinema or Carnival of Films) took place on 8 January 2023 honoring the best films of 2022.

|+Multiple wins
! Awards !! Film
|-

|Aparajito
|-

|-

|-

|-
|}
Winners and Nominees
Jury Awards
{| class="wikitable"
|-

! style="background:#EEDD82;"|
Best Director
|-
|
*Aparajito – Friends Communication
*Dostojee – Katha Talkies
**The Holy Conspiracy – Walzen Media Works Private Limited
**Ballabhpurer Roopkotha –  Shree Venkatesh Films
**Jhilli – Goutam Ghose Associates
**Lokkhi Chele – Windows Production
|
*Anik Dutta – Aparajito
**Dhrubo Banerjee – Karnasubarner Guptodhon
**Kaushik Ganguly – Lokkhi Chele
**Parambrata Chatterjee – Abhijaan
**Raj Chakraborty – Habji Gabji
**Srijit Mukherji – X=Prem
|-

! style="background:#EEDD82;"|

**Arjun Chakraborty – X=Prem as Arnab
**Bratya Basu – Jhora Palok as Jibanananda Das
**Parambrata Chatterjee – Habji Gabji as Aditya Basu
**Riddhi Sen – Bismillah as Bismillah a.k.a. Bishu
|
*Gargi Roy Chowdhury – Mahananda as Mahananda Bhattacharya
**Arpita Chatterjee – Hridpindo as Aarja

**Subhashree Ganguly – Boudi Canteen as Poulami
**Swastika Mukherjee – Shrimati as Shrimati
